ovdesc.p: This screen is used to configure parameters related to Message Acceptance process in Payments Hub. Any record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.MSGACCEPTANCEPARAM

desc.p: API used to forward a message which is not intended for processing in payments hub.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Local directory path to which a message needs to be forwarded in case the message is not intended for processing in the payments hub.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the channel through which a message is received.
Value can be upto 10 alphabetic characters. The value in this field links to field 'ChannelName' in PPT.CHANNEL.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Indicates the name of the queue in which a message is received. Eg
Mandatory value. Value can be upto 16 alphabetic characters.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
API used to send a ACK/NACK message.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Indicates the type of a message.
API used to validate an incoming message.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Name of the file used to store ACK/NACK message prior to sending it to an external system.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
Indicates if a ACK/NACK message is to be sent across, once the message is validated.
User can modify the content of the field with possible values only.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates if a check for duplicate messages is to be performed by the system.
User can modify the content of the field with possible values only.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Specifies the directory over which the payment file is received.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
API used to interpret an incoming SWIFT message.
The field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters.
